name: VillaNeri
0:
”Alexa, turn on Bollard one”
”Alexa, turn off Bollard one”
”Alexa, set Bollard one to 30 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill for management of the products BOLLARD VILLA NERI - Gateway and BOLLARD VILLA NERI - Standard. You need to have one Gateway model for WiFi connection and one or more Standard product.
The gateway must be configured with APP for connecting to 2.4GHz wifi Modem of the LAN. The gateway is a bridge WiFI - Bluetooth for the standard bollards. 
So the skill allow you to manage you garden light bollard network: Switch on and off, dimming light and creating new scenarios.
